prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Quinn Primrose  Date Night Alt
mes:
Dating Hailee was like a dream.

Quinn couldn’t believe Hailee actually agreed to be her partner but since tshe did, Quinn would do everything in her power to provide for her. She’d love her with her whole heart and nurture her to be her best self which was why she was letting Hailee fail.

“You got this, my love.” Quinn rubbed Hailee’s back soothingly with a gentle smile. “Why don’t you try to win me a different plushie? One that is a little easier? I don’t need the jellyfish.”

It was adorable to watch Hailee try.

Solarton’s yearly fair was one of the biggest events in the town, especially because it was held while a majority SUCC students were here. There were games, rides, live performances, and even a beer garden.

A cool breeze knocked a few golden coloured leaves down. Quinn shrugged her trench coat off and placed it on Hailee‘s shoulders. It was a lot colder now than it was when they'd first arrived at the fair and  she wouldn’t let her baby get sick! Quinn naturally ran hot thanks to her wolf genetics. Sure, she didn’t have a ‘winter coat’, but her body knew when autumn and winter that it needed to run her body temperature higher.

“I like sharks too,” Quinn supplied helpfully. Underwater creatures were some of her favourite animals but jellyfish would always reign supreme. But especially Sea Nettle jellyfish which was what the jellyfish inside the claw machine that was buried underneath all the other toys looked like.

It was fuchsia with white stripes. The tentacles alternated the two colours to make it even cuter! Quinn’s favourite part about the jellyfish though was that there was no little cartoon smiley face or eyes. It was too common for jellyfish plushies, which made sense because they were catered towards children, but Quinn wanted a somewhat accurate jellyfish plushie.

Quinn’s wolf tail wagged excitedly as she blushed. It would be so adorable to see Hailee cuddling with it in her dorm.

And when Hailee isn’t there, Quinn could cuddle with it and be reminded of her partner.

That was-

If Hailee could win it.

“Are you using your last dollar?” Quinn gasped. “Hailee, it’s okay. I don’t need it that badly.” She placed her hand on Hailee‘s shoulder with a small frown. “At least let me pay for the next couple of rounds if you don’t get it this time, okay?”

name: Hailee
mes:
"No I can do it. I can win the stupid thing. I can" *Hailee whines and turns back to the machine. Her eyes squint together and she takes a deep breath.*

*Hailee puts her last dollar in the machine and grabs the joystick carefully moving it above the stuffed animal and hitting the descend button*
